name: Paris Hill Tour
description: The Best of Europe is a memorable trip to the magical land of Europe. This meticulous designed itinerary takes you to visit the enchanting castles, alluring landscapes, many beautiful sights. Paris hill is one of them.

name: Lake Garda, Italy
description: Lake Garda, in northern Italy, is known for its crystal clear water. At the south end, the town of Sirmione is dominated by the Rocca Scaligera, a fortress with harbor views. The nearby Grotte di Catullo archaeological site includes a Roman villa.

name: Mount Etna, Italy
description: Mount Etna, or Etna, is an active stratovolcano on the east coast of Sicily, Italy, in the Metropolitan City of Catania, between the cities of Messina and Catania. It lies above the convergent plate margin between the African Plate and the Eurasian Plate.

name: Amalfi Coast, Italy
description: The Amalfi Coast is a 50-kilometer stretch of coastline along the southern edge of Italy’s Sorrentine Peninsula, in the Campania region. It’s a popular holiday destination, with sheer cliffs and a rugged shoreline dotted with small beaches and pastel-colored fishing villages.

name: French Rivira, France
description: The French Riviera (or Côte d'Azur) is the Mediterranean coast of southeastern France. It includes famously glamorous beach resorts such as Saint-Tropez and Cannes, and the independent microstate of Monaco. A health retreat in the 18th century.

name: Lake Geneva, France
description: Book your Hotel in Lake Geneva online. No reservation costs. Great rates. 24/7 Customer Service. We speak your language. Get Instant Confirmation. Read Real Guest Reviews. Best Price Guarantee. No Booking Fees. Types: Hotels, Apartments, Villas, Hostels, Resorts.
